valsi.definition: bridi contradictory negator; scope is an entire bridi; logically negates in some cmavo compounds.
cancel all letteral shifts.
$x_1$ is $x_2$ centuries in duration by standard $x_3$.
$n_1$ is the annual report of company/corporation/organization $k_1$.
contrary scalar negator: other than ...; not ...; a scale or set is implied.
negation sumti qualifier: something other than.
space direction: not towards specified point, contrary negation; direction modal.
modal aspect: has never, and perhaps cannot; other-than-demonstrated-ability.
discursive: metalinguistic negator.
$c_1=n_2$ chirps/makes sound/stridulates $c_2$ rubbing/chafing together wings [body-part] $n_1$ expressing $c_3$ (property)
$x_1$ is a pegasus/winged horse.
$x_1$ is a samara of $x_2$ for producing offspring $x_3$.
tense interval modifier: characteristically/typically; tense/modal; defaults as time tense.
tense interval modifier: atypically; subjective tense/modal; defaults as time tense.
convert selbri to mex operator; used to create less-used operators using le'avla, lujvo, etc.
logical connective: sumti afterthought conditional/only if.
$x_{1}$ (event/state) is a problem to/encountered by $x_{2}$ in situation/task/inquiry $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ requires consideration by $x_2$. See also {preti}, {danfu}, {ciksi}, {jijnu}, {jinvi}, {nandu}, {pensi}, {sidbo}, {spuda}, {raktu}.

valsi.definition: $n_1=p_1$ is a pizza/pie/sandwich/taco/burrito/pirozhki with topping/ingredients $p_2$ and bread of type $n_2=p_3$.
$x_1$ is a quantity of noodles.
$x1=s1$ is a crumb of bread $x2=n1$ from grain $x3=n2$
$s_1$ is a crumb of bread $n_1$ made from grains $n_2$.
$x1=s1$ is a loaf of bread of grains $x2=n2$
$z_1$ bakes bread/cake/pastry $z_2=n_1$ from ingredients $z_3$.
$l_1$ is a numeral in system $l_2$ representing $l_3$=$n_1$.
valsi.notes: If not specified $l_2$ defaults to the Arabic numerals in Western scripts.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a vector of dimension $x_2$ with coordinates $x_3$, $x_4$, $x_5$, ...
$x_1$ is the absolute value/norm of $x_2$.
$b_1$ counts numbers $n_1=p_1$ out aloud.
$c_1=n_1$ is a big problem/crisis for $n_2$ in situation/task/inquiry $n_3$.
$x_1$ is an exception/the only one without property $x_2$ among $x_3$
logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought conditional/only if.
selbri: repeats preceding bridi while denying it as false; pro-assign values are unchanged.
attached to cmavo to negate them; various negation-related meanings.
$j_1=n_2$ is a patriot of nation $n_1$.
$z_1$ is folk music performed at/by $z_2$ (event), originating in group of people $n_2$.
logical connective: tanru-internal afterthought conditional/only if.
$g_1$ is a carrot of variety $g_2$.
$x_1$ is an orange of variety $x_2$.
$ci_1=cu_2$ is an American robin of variety $ci_2$
valsi.notes: Turdus migratorius. This is not the European robin.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a peach [fruit] of species/variety $x_2$
$c_1$ is androphilous/bisexual/straight female/gay male in situation $c_2$ by standard $c_4$.
valsi.notes: This word is only about sexual interest in males; other sexuals interest are irrelevant. See also {fetcinse}, {naknakcinse}, {mitcinse}, {dutcinse}.

valsi.definition: $c_1=f_1$ is male and androphilous/gay/bisexual in situation $c_2$ by standard $c_4$
valsi.notes: This word is about male homosexuality and bisexuality. See also {nakcinse}, {fetfetcinse}, {mitcinse}, {relcinse}.

valsi.definition: $f_1=n_1$ is an unmarried man under law/custom/tradition $s_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a male/buck of species $x_{2}$ evidencing masculine trait(s) $x_{3}$ (ka); $x_{1}$ is masculine.
$p_1$ is a/the penis of $p_2=n_1$.
$si_1$ is feminism, the idea that females and males are alike in quality $sm_3$, as thought by $si_2$.
$x_1$ is a husband of $x_2$ (spouse) according to marriage law/custom/tradition $x_3$.
$n_1=b_1$ is a bull/steer/ox/male bovine of species/breed $n_2=b_2$.
$t_1$ is a patriarch of people/territory/domain/subjects $t_2$.
$bi_1$ unrolls under condition $bi_3$.
$b_1=n_1$ is gentile.
$k_1$ is an atheist.
$x_{1}$ is a/the wing [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: lateral supporting surface].
$x_1$ is uninteresting to $x_2$.
$x_1$ is senior/older/other than young by standard $x_2$.
$c_1$ is lay (non-professional) in event/activity $c_2$ by standard $c_3$.
$c_1$ abstains from eating $c_2$; $c_1$ fasts.
$x_{1}$ does not want/desire $x_{2}$ (event/state) for purpose $x_{3}$.
$f_1$ [member] is uncommon/atypical/unusual in property $f_2$ (ka) among members of $f_3$ (set).
$x_1=d_1$ is a period of $x_2=d_2$ non-working days/vacation days/holidays for worker $x_3=g_1$ at job $x_4=g_2$
$x_1$ is inattentive towards/distracted/inadvertent of object/affair $x_2$.
$j_1$ is inattentive towards/distracted from object/affair $j_2$.
$m_1$ forgets fact/memory $m_2$ about subject $m_3$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {na'e}, {morji}, {tolmo'i}. Assumes that {morji} refers to a state i.e. 'remember'= 'retain in memory'.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is incomplete/unfinished in property $x_2$ by standard $x_3$ .
$p_1$ gives consent/agreement/sanction to $p_2$ (person/force ind./mass) about $p_3$ (abstract).
$r_1$ leaves $r_2$ alone/in peace.
$g_1=r_2$ is tranquil/happy about $g_2=r_1$.
$c_1$ does not eat meat $c_2=r_1$; $c_1$ is a vegetarian.
$r_1$ (NU) is casual, not formal/ceremonial.
$x_1=c_2$ is uninterested in $x_2=c_1$.
$j_2$ is uncooked/raw.
$x_1$ is wingless/has no wings.
$x_1$ is wingless/has no wings.
$r_2$ is calm/untroubled about $r_1$ with result $r_3$.
$f_1=n_1$ is unmarried under law/custom/tradition $s_3$.
$s_1$ is dishonest/disingenuous to $s_2$ about $s_3$.
$s_1$ (agent) is relentless/unceasing in activity/process/state $s_2$.
$c_1=t_1$ is withdrawn, feeling emotion $c_2$ about $c3=t_3$ from $t_2$.
$x_1$ (event/person) is unimportant/insignificant to $x_2$ (event/person) due to/in aspect $x_3$; $x_2$ doesn't care about $x_1$'s $x_3$-ness.
valsi.notes: I found myself saying [{na'e} {vajni}] very often and thus thought that it'd be nice to have a lujvo for it.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is unrepentant of $x_2$.
$x_1$ is unremorseful of $x_2$.
$x_1$ is absent from $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a googol [$10^{100}$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default units).
$x_{1}$ is a googolplex [$10^{googol}$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default units).
$x_{1}$ (li) is a number/quantifier/digit/value/figure (noun); refers to the value and not the symbol.
$x_1=k_1=n_2$ [agent] tries to solve puzzle/enigma/riddle/charade $x_2=k_2=n_1$ in game/contest $x_3=n_3$
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains bread [leavened or unleavened] made from grains $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ reflects Central American culture/nationality/geography in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a matzo made from grain $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ years in duration (default is 1 year) by standard $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is annual.
valsi.notes: This year (= {cabna'a}); next year (= {bavlamna'a}); last year (= {prulamna'a}). See also {detri}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {masti}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is difficult/hard/challenging for $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ challenges (non-agentive) $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is the South African English language used by $x_2$ to express/communicate $x_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$x_1$ is South Africa.
Master
$x_{1}$ is a boy/lad [young male person] of age $x_{2}$ immature by standard $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use verba). See also {nixli}, {verba}, {nanmu}, {bersa}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a man/men; $x_{1}$ is a male humanoid person [not necessarily adult].
valsi.notes: Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use remna or prenu). See also {ninmu}, {remna}, {prenu}, {makcu}, {nanla}, {bersa}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is south by west of $x_2$ in reference frame $x_3$.
$x_1$ is South Slavic/Yugoslavian in aspect $x_2$.
valsi.notes: South Slavic if the aspect is language, else Yugoslavian; see also {slovino}, {bolgaro}, {slovo}, {serbo} (experimental)

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is southwest of $x_2$ in frame of reference $x_3$.
$x_1$ is southeast of $x_2$ in frame of reference $x_3$.
$x_1$ is southeast by east of $x_2$ in frame of reference $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a billionth/thousand-millionth [$10^{-9}$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ is a nut [body-part: hard-shelled fruit] from plant/species $x_{2}$ with shell $x_{3}$ and kernel $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also $x_4$ nucleus, center (= {velnarge} for place reordering). See also {grute}, {stagi}, {jbari}, {midju}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a nargileh/hookah for smoking $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a cashew of species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is pecan/hickory of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a pistachio of species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is dirty laundry worn by $x_2$ for purpose $x_3$, dirty with $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is orange [color adjective].
$p_1$ is unique/unequaled/unparalleled/unmatched / the only one of its kind.
weak bridi negation; almost, but not quite.
$x_{1}$ (du'u) contradicts/denies/refutes/negates $x_{2}$ (du'u) under rules/logic $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also exception (= {nafmupli}); agentive contradict/deny (= nafxu'a or {tolxu'a}). See also {nibli}, {tugni}, {zanru}, {xusra}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a nation/ethnic group of peoples $x_{2}$; [people sharing a history/culture].
$p_1$ loves/feels strong affectionate devotion towards the nation/ethnic group $n_2$; $p_1$ is a patriot/nationalist.
$s_1$ is a nationalist political ideology as applied by $t_1=p_1$ among/in people/territory/domain $t_2$ based on the works of thinker $s_3$
tense: refers to current space/time reference absolutely.
Mr./Mister
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of inert gas of type $x_{2}$ [neon/argon/radon/xenon/krypton].
$m_1=n_1$ is $m_2=n_2$ nanometer(s) / billionth(s) of a meter [metric unit] in length (default 1) measured in direction $m_3=n_3$ by standard $x_4=m_3$.
$z_1$ is a nanobot performing function $z_2$ under conditions $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a canal/channel to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$ with route $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is the nose [body-part] of $x_{2}$ with nostril(s)/nasal passage(s) $x_{3}$; [metaphor: protrusion].
non-restrictive relative phrase marker: which incidentally is associated with ...
location tense relation/direction; approximating/next to ...
location tense relation/direction; within/inside of/into ...
unary mathematical operator: factorial; a!.
location tense relation/direction; south of.
$cr_1=d_1$ is a halter top of material $cr_2$.
valsi.notes: A subtype of "tube top" ({jancaucreka}), with a single strap around the back of the neck. Suggested shortest fu'ivla form: ebdrka. Cf. {creka}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a swan (genus Cygnus) of species/strain $x_2$
$j_1$ is the axis (cervical vertebra) of $c_2$
$cr_1=s_1$ is a polo-neck garment of material $cr_2$.
valsi.notes: Usually a sweater ({nivycreka}), with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck. Suggested shortest fu'ivla form: epcrka. Cf. {creka}.

valsi.definition: $k_1$ is a guillotine/executioner's axe for beheading $k_2$.
$ci_1=cn_2=v_1$ is a heron/egret/bittern of species $ci_2$
valsi.notes: Members of family Ardeidae are noted for flying with their necks folded.

valsi.definition: $j_1$ is a necktie made of material $d_2$ worn by $c_2$.
Holland/The Netherlands.
pro-bridi: repeats the current bridi.
pro-sumti: this paragraph
$x_1=n_1=z_1$ likes $x_3=n_2$ more than $x_2=z_2$ does, by margin $x_4=z_4$.
$x_{1}$ is energy of type $x_{2}$ in form $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is fond of/likes/has a taste for $x_{2}$ (object/state).
$n_1$ is most fond of $n_2=t_1$ (object/state) from set $t_4$, due to extreme $t_3$ (ka; default ka zmadu).
valsi.notes: Cf. {nelci}, {traji}, {plicu'a}. Also: $n_1$ likes/prefers $n_2=t_1$ the most out of set $t_4$.

valsi.definition: $s_1=n_1$ recommends $s_2=n_2$ to audience $s_3$.
$x_{1}$ is in/inside/within $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is on the inside/interior of $x_{2}$ [totally within the bounds of $x_{2}$].
valsi.notes: Indicates total containment. (cf. se vasru (for containment that need not be total), jbini, zvati, cpana, sruri, senta, snuji, bartu, diklo, jibni, jinru, setca)

valsi.definition: $x_1$ imports $x_2$ to $x_3$ from $x_4$ via $x_5$ .
$x_1=b_1=n_1$ enters [becomes inside-of] $x_2=n_2$ under conditions $x_3=b_3$
$c_1$ is a singlet/undershirt/vest of material $c_2$.
$x_1$ is a lobster of species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is an entrance/entry/entryway/inlet/way in to $x_2$ for $x_3$ .
$n_1=k_1$ enters $n_2=k_2$ from origin $k_3$ via route $k_4$ using means/vehicle $k_5$.
$k_1=n_1$ is a hallway / indoor street within $k_2=n_2$ accessing $k_3$.
$x1$=$t1$=$n1$ is underwear, worn by/on $x2$=$t2$, for purpose $x3$=$t3$, worn under $x4$=$n2$
abstractor: quantity/amount abstractor; $x_{1}$ is quantity/amount of [bridi] measured on scale $x_{2}$.
location tense relation/direction; downwards/down from ...
$x_1$ is a submarine for carrying $x_2$, propelled by $x_3$.
convert selbri to mex operand; used to create new non-numerical quantifiers; e.g. "herd" of oxen.
nibli modal, 1st place logically; logically because ...
sumti question asking for a logical proof; why?.
nibli modal, 1st place despite logic ...
discursive: paragraph break; introduce new topic.
digit/number: minus sign; negative number); default any negative.
$x_1$ is an anion of radical/(atom of element)$x_2$ with $x_3$ charges.
$j_1$ concludes that $n_1$ (du'u) logically implies $n_2$ under rules $n_3$.
$x_{1}$ logically necessitates/entails/implies action/event/state $x_{2}$ under rules/logic system $x_{3}$.
$x_1=n_1$ (idea/fact/du'u) suggests/intimates that $x_2=n_2=s_2$ (idea/fact/du'u) is true as it appears to $x_3=s_3$
valsi.notes: From {nibli} {stidi}. Unlike {stidi}, it refers to person's internal logical reasoning about facts, not external suggestion.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a nighttime of day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is at night/nocturnal.
valsi.notes: Tonight (= {cabycte}); tomorrow night (= {bavlamcte}, even when tonight is still in the future); last night (= {prulamcte}). See also {donri}, {djedi}, {tcika}.

valsi.definition: $g_1$ (agent) tidies/cleans up/neatens/straightens $c_1$ in property/quantity $c_2$ (ka/ni).
$x_1$ is Nheengatu/Tupi/Lingua Geral in aspect $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of nickel/other metal resistant to oxidation.
$x_1$ is the size of $x_2$ in property/dimension $x_3$ on scale $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ [furniture items] furnishes $x_{2}$ [location] serving purpose/function $x_{3}$.
$n_1$ is the length of $c_1$ in dimension $c_2$ measured on scale $n_3=c_3$.
$n_1$ is the temperature of $g_1$ measured on scale $n_2$.
$n_1$ is a number of points / score / indication of an attempt to win a competition won by $j_1$ over opponent(s) $j_3$ in competition $j_4$, points measured on scale $n_2$.
valsi.notes: n2 moved to the end due to apparent uselessness. Made from {ni} and {jinga}.

valsi.definition: $ni_1$ is the age [elapsed duration] of $c_1$ by standard $c_2$
$n_1$ is the speed / amount of fast-ness measured on scale $n_2$ of thing / agent $s_1$ in / at doing / being / bringing about $s_2$ (event / state).
$n_1$ (number) is the population of inhabitant group $g_1$ in area $x_2$ measured on scale $n_2$.
Ms.
$b_1$ is LÃ¡adan.
valsi.notes: A constructed language by Suzette Haden Elgin

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a water-lily (Nymphaea) of species/strain $x_2$
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of citrus [fruit/tree, etc.] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a Persian lime [fruit/tree etc.] of cultivar $x_2$.
valsi.notes: Member of species Citrus latifolia. Cf. {nimre}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a lemon [fruit/tree etc.] of cultivar $x_2$.
valsi.notes: Member of species Citrus limon. Cf. {nimre}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a key lime [fruit/tree, etc.] of cultivar $x_2$.
$j_1$ is a quantity of citrus jelly made from $n_1$.
$cu_1=cn_1$ is a new business involving persons $cu_2$
$p_1$ is an intrepreneur involved in business $cu_1=cn_1$
$gas_1$ resets/changes $gal_1$ to a new value/content.
$x_{1}$ is a woman/women; $x_{1}$ is a female humanoid person [not necessarily adult].
valsi.notes: Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use remna or prenu). See also {nanmu}, {remna}, {prenu}, {makcu}, {nixli}.

valsi.definition: $c_1=p_1$ is a stranger to $c_2$ in aspect $c_3$ by standard $c_4$
valsi.notes: since ninpre in the sense of "novice" seems to be deprecated in favor of nintadni, this seems to be a better definition.

valsi.definition: $c_2=t_1$ is a beginner in subject $c_1=t_2$ by standard $c_4$
$d_1$ is New Year's Day of $d_2=n_1=c_1$ at location $d_3$ in calendar $d_4$.
$nu_1$ is the celebration of the New Year as celebrated by $s_1$ at the beginning of year $na_1=c_1$ according to standard $na_3$; $nu_1$ is the New Year.
$m_1=s_1$ is a beanie hat of material $m_2$.
$d_1=s_1$ is an adhesive tape/cellotape/Scotch Tape/duct tape of material $d_2$, which sticks to $s_2$.
$p_1=s_1$ is a legging of material $p_2$.
$xu_1$ is an instance of anesthetic blocking impulses from nerve group/system $n_1=c_1$ of $n_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a nerve/neuron [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: information/control network connection].
valsi.notes: Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is neural. See also ve {benji}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ needs/requires/is dependent on/[wants] necessity $x_{2}$ for purpose/action/stage of process $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: No implication of lack. See also {banzu}, {cidja}, {claxu}, {pindi}, {xebni}, {sarcu}, {lacri}, {djica}, {taske}, {xagji}.

valsi.definition: $k_1$ descends/goes down to $k_2=c_1$ from $k_3=c_2$ via $k_4$ using means $k_5$.
$z_1=c_1$ is lower than $z_2$ beneath $c_2$ in frame of reference $c_3$ by amount/excess $z_4$.
$t_1=c_1$ is the lowest among set/range $t_4$ beneath $c_2$ in frame of reference $c_3$.
$s_1$ dips at an angle of $s_2$ to reference frame $s_3$, to beneath $c_2$.
$z_1$ sits on surface $z_2=c_1$ that is below $c_2$ in frame of refernce $c_3$.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ newton (s) of force (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) knits $x_{2}$ [cloth/object] from yarn/thread $x_{3}$.
$c_1=n_2$ is a sweater of material $c_2=n_3$.
valsi.notes: A knitted jacket or jersey, usually of thick wool. Cf. {creka}, {tafrkardiga}.

valsi.definition: Miss
$x_{1}$ is a girl [young female person] of age $x_{2}$ immature by standard $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use verba). See also {nanla}, {verba}, {ninmu}.

valsi.definition: digit/number: 0 (digit) [zero].
pro-bridi: repeats the bridi in which this one is embedded.
midpoint scalar negator: neutral point between je'a and to'e; "not really".
negation sumti qualifier: the neutral form/value of.
discursive: paragraph break; resume previous topic.
digit/number: typical/average value.
Selbri incidental relative clause; attaches to a selbri with the ke'a being "me'ei the attached selbri"
non-restrictive appositive phrase marker: which incidentally is the same thing as ...
$x_{1}$ is noble/aristocratic/elite/high-born/titled in/under culture/society/standard $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Also upper-class; high/low, upper/lower are poor Lojban metaphors; note $x_2$ standard applies when the title/nobility is not recognized culture/society wide; this would include self-assumed titles. See also {banli}.

valsi.definition: logically quantified sumti: nothing at all (unless restricted).
non-restrictive relative clause; attaches subordinate bridi with incidental information.
$c_1$ announces/proclaims $c_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience $c_3=n_4$ via expressive medium $c_4$.
Sir/Madam
$b_1=n_1$ is titled with high aristocratic/noble/elite status in/under culture/society $b_3=n_2$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {nobli}, {banli}, {kamba'i}. 'Your Highness' or 'Your Majesty' is {doi nolba'i).

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is an orb made of $b_2$ used by $n_1$.
$g_1$ is a sceptre made of $g_2$ used by $n_1$.
$x_1$ is a Jedi of power / level / rank $x_2$
$k_1$ is a courtier to sovereign/aristocrat/noble $k_2$ in culture/country $n_2=k_3$.
$m_1$ is a crown made of $m_2$.
$m_1=n_1$ is elegant to $m_2=n_2$.
Sir
$ni_1=no_1$ is a lady, considered noble in culture/society/standard $no_2$.
Madam/Lady
$t_1=n_1$ is a regent/monarch of $t_2$ by standard $n_2$.
$s_1$ is a servant of sovereign/aristocrat/noble $s_2=n_1$ in culture/country $n_2$ with responsibilities $s_3$.
$s_1$ is a throne/ceremonial chair used by noble/aristocratic/elite/high-born/titled in/under culture/society/standard $n_2$.
$ni_1=j_1=no_1$ is a Duke/Baron/Count/Earl/Marquess/ [titled noble of middle rank] ruling $j_2$ under culture/standard $no_2$.
$ni_1=j_1=no_1$ is a Duchess/Baroness/Countess/Marchioness/ [titled noble of middle rank] ruling $j_2$ under culture/standard $no_2$..
$x_1$ is the king of $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$x_1$ is the queen of $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$z_1$ is a palace of/for noble person(s) $n_1=z_2$.
$z_1=n_1$ the classical music performed at/by $z_2$ (event) originating in culture $n_1$.
discursive utterance ordinal: zeroth section/chapter ordinal; foreword.
$x1=z1$ voluntarily does action $x2=z2=b2$ to achieve goal $x3=z3$
valsi.notes: In the sense: Doing something, when refusing would have no repercussions. Unpaid action not implied.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a Sunday of week $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Sunday is either day seven or day zero, depending on your perspective.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is undecided/makes no decision about $x_2$.
$x_1$ is alone/lonely/lonesome in state/condition/enterprise $x_2$.
$c_2$ disbelieves in god/deity $c_1$ with dominion over $c_3$; $c_2$ is an atheist.
$x_1$ is available for free/without cost to $x_2$ from provider $x_3$.
$x_1$ is invisible from point-of-view $x_2$.
$j_2$ (du'u) is a mystery for $j_1$, the subject being $j_3$.
$x1=r2$ is careless
$x_1$ is nonsense/nonsensical to $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the additive inverse of $x_2$.
Nora LeChevalier (was Tansky)
valsi.notes: Nora is one of the Original Lojbanists

valsi.definition: $x1=b1$ is middle-sized in property $x2=b2$ by standard $x3=b3$
$c_1$ neither gets $c_2$ from $c_3$ nor puts $c_2$ at $c_3$
Norway.
$x_1$ reflects Norwegian culture/nationality in aspect $x_2$
$x_1$ reflects Norman culture/nationality/language in aspect $x_2$.
tense interval modifier: never; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.
$x_1$ is indifferent/neutral/apathetic about event $x_2$, expected likelihood $x_3$.
$x_1$ is indifferent/apathetic/dispassionate/uninvolved/unmoved towards/with/by $x_2$.
$x_1=c_2$ is disinterested in $x_2=c_1$.
$s_1=v_1$ is an interpretation of $s_2$ recognized by $s_3$ but judged unimportant by $v_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a norovirus of species/breed/defining property $x_{2}$ capable of infecting [at] $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: From the city of Norwalk, Ohio, and {vidru}. The scientific name of the virus was first "Norwalk agent" and then shortened to "norovirus". See also {xilvidru}, {remjinkytoldu'evidru} and {vidru}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$Â is indifferent towards $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a message/notice/memorandum about subject $x_{2}$ from author $x_{3}$ to intended audience $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Emphasis on brevity, single or identifiable subject (contrast with xatra: the emphasis in notci is on the single or cohesively focused subject, while the audience is less defined - indeed only an 'intended' audience. xatra need not have a single or focussed subject - its corresponding place is for 'content'); reminder/memo/note (= {mojnoi}). See also {xatra}, {nuzba}, {mrilu}, {morji}.

valsi.definition: $c_1$ notes down $c_2$ on display/storage medium $c_3$ with writing implement $c_4$.
$c_1$ announces/proclaims $c_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience $c_3=n_4$ via expressive medium $c_4$.
abstractor: generalized event abstractor; $x_{1}$ is state/process/achievement/activity of [bridi].
convert mathematical expression (mex) operator to a selbri/tanru component.
vocative: promise - promise release - un-promise.
vocative: promise - promise release - un-promise.
vocative: promise - promise release - un-promise.
start forethought termset construct; marks start of place structure set with logical connection.
modal aspect: can but has not; unrealized potential.
$g_1$ is virgin/sexually inexperienced
$x1$=$s1$ is single (never been married) by law/convention $x2$=$s3$
elidable terminator: end forethought termset; usually elidable except with following sumti.
New York
$x_{1}$ is magenta/fuchsia/purplish-red [color adjective].
$x1=n1=t1$ is a village/[rural town] of area $x2=n2=t2$, in political unit $x3=t3$, serving hinterland/region $x4=t4$
$n_1$ is an event of $b_1$ being foolish/silly/stupid in event/action /property (ka) $b_2$.
$n_1$ is a conversation involving $c_1$(s) (mass normally, but 1 individual/jo'u possible) about topic/subject $c_2$.
$n_1$ is the killing by $c_1$ of $c_2$ by action/method $c_3$.
$n_1$ is the youth of $c_1$.
$x_1=n_1$ is a change in property/quantity $x_2=c_2$ (ka/ni) of amount/degree $x_3=c_3$ under conditions $x_4=c_4$.
$n_1$ is order (state of being well arranged) of $c_1$ with orderliness $c_2$.
$n_1$ is an event at which $c_1$ eat(s) $c_2$.
$n_1$ is a fight/battle in which $d_1$ fights $d_2$ over issue $d_3$ (abstract).
$n_1$ is a fight/battle in which $d_1$ fights $d_2$ over issue $d_3$ (abstract).
$n_1$ is a dance with dancer(s) $d_1$ (individual, mass) to music/rhythm $d_2$.
$n_1$ is a pause by $d_1$ for/until $d_2$ at state $d_3$ before starting/continuing $d_4$ (activity/process).
$n_1$ is a pause by $d_1$ for/until $d_2$ at state $d_3$ before starting/continuing $d_4$ (activity/process).
$n_1$ is the equality of rights $k_1=d_3$ entitled to $k_2=d_1=d_2$.
$n_1$ is a facial expression (countenance) of agent $f_2=c_1$ expressing $f_1=c_2$.
$n_1$ is a trial of dispute $j_2$ involving people $f_3$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {nu}, {pajni}, {tavla}, {fapro}, {nunpai}, {flapaizda}. x3 includes not only the disputing parties but also the judge and juries, which may be connected with "jo'u".

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is the decay/fermentation (recycling of matter/energy/electrons) of $f_1$ by chemical agent $f_2$.
$x1=n1$ is joy of $x2=g1$ from $x3=g2$
$n_1$ is fishery (fish industry) of product $c_2$ (aquatic animals) from source/area $c_3=t_1$ (ocean/sea/coast/lake/river) by fishermen $c_1$.
valsi.notes: x2 can be any harvestable aquatic animals, including mollusks and crustaceans. Cf. {crepu}.

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is the life of $j_1$.
$x_1$ is a gathering/meeting/assembly/conclave/conference/ congregation/congress/convention/encounter/get-together/reunion of participants $x_2$ at location $x_3$ from locations $x_4$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {nu}, {jmaji}, {jdijmaji}, {nunpe'i} for a meeting between two parties.

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is an established connection between $j_1$ and $j_2$ at common locus $j_3$.
valsi.notes: $n_1$ or $j_1$ may be a mass formed with "joi", as is the case in a computer network between a server and clients. Cf. {jorne}, {srana}.

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is a condition of $ku_1$ managing the health of $ka_1$.
valsi.notes: Usually the prevention, treatment, and management of illness and the preservation of mental and physical well-being through the services offered by the medical, nursing, and allied health professions. x2 and x3 may the same or different. Cf. {kamnu'a}.

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is a game played by $k_1$ playing with plaything/toy $k_2$
$n_1$ is the lateness of $l_1$ (event) by standard $l_2$.
$n_1$ is the laugh/laughter of/by $c_1$
$n_1$ is medical, involving doctor/nurse $m_1$, patient $m_2$, ailment $m_3$, and treatment/cure $m_4$.
$n_1$ is the death (state of being dead) of $m_1$ (person).
$n_1$ is the event of $m_1$ motivating action $m_2$ per volition $m_3$.
$n_1$ is a trial/judgement/arbitration with judge/arbitrator/referee $p_1$ determining/deciding matter $p_2$.
$x_1$ is a meeting between $x_2$ and $x_3$ at/in location $x_4$.
$x1=n1$ is a jump of $x2=p1$ to $x3=p2$ from $x4=p3$ with height $x5=p4$
$x_{1}$ is a believe-deceived with deceive-belief subject $x_{2}$ with deception subject $x_{3}$.
$n_1$ is self-restraint shown by $f_1=s_2$
$n_1$ is an event of integration between $s_1=b_1$
$x1=n1$ is a sleep/[an event of sleeping] of $x2=s1$
$n_1$ is engineering in branch $s_2$ based on methodology $s_3$
$n_1$ is the marriage of $s_1$ and $s_2$ according to tradition $s_3$.
$n_1$ is the effort of $t_1$ trying/attempting to do/attain $t_2$ (event/state/property) by actions/method $t_3$
$n_1$ is agriculture of product $c_2$ from source/area $c_3=t_1$ by farmers $c_1$
$n_1$ is an earthquake at location $t_2$.
$s_1$ is a trip/drug-induced hallucination about $s_2$ due to chemical substance $xu_2$ with purity $xu_3$.
$n_1$ is the freedom of $z_1$ doing $z_2$ under condition $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) promises/commits/assures/threatens $x_{2}$ (event/state) to $x_{3}$ [beneficiary/victim].
$b_1$ archives $s_1=b_2$ in medium $b_5$.
$f_1$ is a backup / danger avoiding duplicate / copy of $f_2=s_1$ in form / medium $f_3$ made by method $f_4$ to protect / secure against event $s_2$ (generally destruction or loss).
$x_{1}$ is a rural/rustic/pastoral area of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ is in the country.
$x_1$ is a neutron in quantum state $x_2$.
$x_1$ saves/rescues/redeems/delivers $x_2$=$s_1$ from threat/peril $s_2$
$x_{1}$ is neutral/not taking sides/medial/not towards any extreme on scale/in dissension $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Also $x_2$ dispute/struggle (though $x_2$ is not limited to disagreements, which is merely one manifestation of scalar or distributed values in which there is a medial position). See also {midju}, {lanxe}, {milxe}, {mutce}, cmavo list {no'e}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (du'u) is news/tidings/new information about subject $x_{2}$ from source $x_{3}$, to observer $x_{4}$.
$x_1$ reflects New Zealand culture/nationality/geography/dialect in aspect $x_2$.
$no_1$ is a news/press release with news $nu_1$ about subject $nu_2=no_2$ issued by $no_3$ for audience $no_4$.
letteral for n.
